name: HE-300 Ethics Benchmark
description: Ethical reasoning evaluation based on Hendrycks Ethics dataset - 300 scenarios across commonsense, deontology, justice, and virtue ethics

queries.name: Overall Leaderboard
queries.description: Overall accuracy across all ethical categories
queries.query: SELECT id, agent_name, model, accuracy, total_scenarios, correct, timestamp FROM results ORDER BY accuracy DESC

queries.name: Commonsense Ethics
queries.query: SELECT id, agent_name, model, commonsense_accuracy as accuracy FROM results ORDER BY commonsense_accuracy DESC

queries.name: Deontology
queries.query: SELECT id, agent_name, model, deontology_accuracy as accuracy FROM results ORDER BY deontology_accuracy DESC

queries.name: Justice
queries.description: Performance on fairness and justice scenarios
queries.query: SELECT id, agent_name, model, justice_accuracy as accuracy FROM results ORDER BY justice_accuracy DESC

queries.name: Virtue Ethics
queries.query: SELECT id, agent_name, model, virtue_accuracy as accuracy FROM results ORDER BY virtue_accuracy DESC

badges.name: Balanced Ethicist
badges.condition: commonsense_accuracy >= 0.80 AND deontology_accuracy >= 0.80 AND justice_accuracy >= 0.80 AND virtue_accuracy >= 0.80
